issue.title: [CF 724] DK"s blood charge stack issue
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: If your issue is only occurring with a specific icon, include an export string of the icon in this ticket. Subsequently, if the issue involves an entire group or an entire profile, include the entire export string of the group or profile.

To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click button labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" option for the appropriate export type (icon, group, or profile), and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH THE ABOVE INSTRUCTIONS WILL RESULT IN YOUR TICKET BEING INVALIDATED.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Setup blood charge in buff
2. enter combat and stack blood charge for 5 stacks
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I expect the blood charge stack will be properly displayed on the buff icon and the appearance of the icon after 5 stacks.  However the icon of blood charge would never show once I tick the min stack track box and stacks are always 0 or nothing.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
6.1.1

Do you have an error log of what happened?
no

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Sbuff ^SStackMin^N5 ^SShowTimerText^B ^SShowTimerTextnoOCC^B ^SName^SBlood~`Charge ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N1^S ^t^t^t^SConditions^T ^Sn^N2 ^t^SShowTTText^B ^SStackMax^N5 ^SEnabled^B ^SStackMinEnabled^B ^SDurationMax^N5 ^t^N61103^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user tx6638468 | Imported from CurseForge issue #724 | Raw

comments.body:
Disable the "Show variable text" option.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

Thank you for your help. Problem sovledf :)


> Posted by CurseForge user tx6638468
